remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类指定的正交投影[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)]模型到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)]可视化图面。This class specifies an orthogonal projection of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] model to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] visual surface. 如，它指定位置、 查看方向和"向上"方向。Like , it specifies a position, viewing direction, and "upward" direction. 与不同，但是，描述不包括透视收缩的投影。Unlike , however, describes a projection that does not include perspective foreshortening. 换而言之，描述了一个边是并行的而不是在场景的即将推出的点取景框。In other words, describes a viewing box whose sides are parallel, instead of one whose sides meet in a point at the scene's horizon. 下图显示了正投影和透视缩短照相机投影之间的差异。The following diagram shows the difference between orthographic and perspective-foreshortened camera projections. ![正投影和透视投影](~/add/media/camera-projections4.png "正投影和透视投影")![Orthographic and perspective projection](~/add/media/camera-projections4.png "Orthographic and perspective projection") ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建并切换摄像机投影。The following example shows how to create an and toggle camera projections.
